pullrequest.title: Gazebo models of harbour entities - 20 and 40 feet containers

content.raw:
Thanks for removing `model2` from the config. Could you remove the files themselves too? `hg remove container20/model2.sdf` should do it, and then the same for the 40 ft container.

For some reason I'm back with the bad scale, and when I insert the model into Gazebo it crashes. Are you being able to use the models normally?
content.html:
Thanks for removing model2 from the config. Could you remove the files themselves too? hg remove container20/model2.sdf should do it, and then the same for the 40 ft container.

For some reason I'm back with the bad scale, and when I insert the model into Gazebo it crashes. Are you being able to use the models normally?
